author: mstarets
msg: TRINIDAD-1655 Fix to JIRA-1647 introduced bug where HTMLEscapes._writeText isn't paying attention to startIndex
Thanks to Blake Sullivan for the patch.
Copy and paste error causes the char[] version of HTMLEscapes._WriteText to start at 0 instead of startIndex. OOps!
